reference_summary:
Hair Treatment Mask 120ml, 2019 PURC Magical Hair Mask, Deep Conditioner for Dry or Damaged Hair, 5 Seconds Repairs Damage Hair Root and Keratin GHEART {'Brand': 'GHEART', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Dull, Frizzy, Color Treated, Dry, Chemically Treated, Damaged', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '2.8 x 2.8 x 1.9 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Hair Treatment Mask-411', 'UPC': '778299243728'} I bought two masks to try out. This one for dry and damaged hair and a keratin one. First, I want to say my hair is very damaged. The top of my hair seems oily but the bottom is super dry. I buy regular conditioner from just any store and they never detangle my hair. My niece told me I needed to try a "hair mask." I had never heard of it but she swears by it. So I decided to give it a try. You guys, it really works. You have to follow the directions though and put it on your hair longer than what the bottle says. The more damaged your hair is, the longer you should keep it on. I left mine on for a long while.. I cant even remember how long. I think maybe 30 minutes? Anyhow, when I washed it off, my hair actually was actually easier to comb through. I wish I could find conditioners like this though b/c I don't want to spend so much washing my hair! leave on longer and it will be smoother PARWIN BEAUTY Curling Wand 5 in 1 Curling Iron Set with 5 Interchangeable Ceramic Barrels 0.5” to 1.25” Hair Curling Wand Set, Rose Gold PARWIN PRO BEAUTY {'Brand': 'PARWIN PRO BEAUTY', 'Hair Type': 'All, Curly, Fine, Normal', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Size': '1 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Package Dimensions': '10.1 x 4.8 x 3.2 inches; 2.55 Pounds', 'UPC': '658709253601', 'Manufacturer': 'PARWIN BEAUTY'} I returned this. Not worth it. was not as expected. Can't get a response returned Mini Rubber Bands Soft Elastic Bands for Kids Hair Non-slip Rubber Hair Bands Soft Hair Elastics Ties Bands Braids Hair for Girls - STRONG - REUSEABLE (Colorful1000+Black1000) OLEWELL {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'OLEWELL', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 1 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SML'} I for these to use for the ends of my side ponytail. When I use my regular bands. They are just too big and bulky and they tangle up.

So good thing about these are:
- they do not tangle my hair
- they stretch a bit but not too much
- they give you a ton of them so you don’t feel bad losing them

Con:
- they break fairly easy Breaks fairly easy but you can plenty of them LANGE HAIR Extendé Conditioning Detangler Hair Spray - Paraben Free Leave-in Conditioner Spray, Detangles and Hydrates Hair, Moisture & Shine | 4OZ {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Curly, Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Helps protect color and reinforces strands, leaving them strong and vibrant', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 1.4 x 1.4 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '793150592708'} I have the worst tangled hair ever from all the highlights and dying it I've done over the last 15 years. My hair is so damaged. And also because it is so long, it's almost impossible to manager. I also have a TON of hair. When I go to the salon, they usually have two people blow drying my hair. Anyhow, I have a detanger brush, I've bought hair mask, I've used leave in conditioner, and I've used different detanglers. (I've done the it's the 10 product also). I have to say I was very impressed with this bottle. Right off when I sprayed it, I noticed it came out different. It wasn't a spray, it was more of a mist spray so it sprayed more powerfully but evenly and wide. I used it right after I showered and towel dried my hair and then sprayed it and brushed. And it worked. i was able to detangle my hair. The only thing I wish was that this bottle was bigger. It's pretty small! detangled my highlighted 15 year damaged hair JMOSTRG 4.2V Mini Battery Box Kit (Color) JMOSTRG {'Package Dimensions': '5 x 3.7 x 3.31 inches; 8.47 Ounces', 'UPC': '190731969162'} This is so cute and perfect! This will encourage kids to carry around their hand sanitizer and you can keep refilling it and save money! Definitely worth it. perfect to encourage kids to use hand sanitizer
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Type:** Prefers products for dry, damaged, and chemically treated hair, with concerns about oiliness at the roots and dryness at the ends.
- **Product Interests:** Focused on hair treatments, particularly masks for deep conditioning and hydration. Recently expanded interest to include multifunctional products like leave-in conditioning sprays. Also shows an openness to practical and cute accessories, as evidenced by a recent purchase aimed at encouraging kids to maintain hygiene, indicating an affinity for affordable and useful items.
- **Usage Behavior:** Open to trying new products, particularly those with positive recommendations, while being discerning based on previous experiences. Recently showed satisfaction with a detangling product that alleviated tangling issues, demonstrating a balance between exploration and cautiousness in product selection.
- **Application Preferences:** Willingly modifies application times and closely follows directions for optimal results, showcasing a thoughtful approach to hair care.
- **Value Sensitivity:** Seeks effective and affordable solutions, expressing frustration with the performance of pricier items, underscoring a desire for value without compromising quality.
- **Brand Loyalty:** Open to exploring various brands for better hair management while remaining careful about new investments in styling tools and accessories.

Overall, the user is committed to discovering effective, budget-friendly hair care solutions focused on repairing and hydrating damaged hair, while increasingly valuing functional accessories that enhance both utility and aesthetic appeal in their routine.
